Uses of Package
perfcenter.simulator.metric

  • Packages that use perfcenter.simulator.metric 
    Package Description
    perfcenter.simulator
    This package contains the improved classes over almost all classes of perfcenter.baseclass package.
    perfcenter.simulator.metric
    This package contains the classes that provide metric hierarchy for collecting observed values during simulation.
    perfcenter.simulator.queue
    This package contains the classes that implement the Queue's simulation-time objects and book-keepings.
  • Classes in perfcenter.simulator.metric used by perfcenter.simulator 
    Class and Description
    DiscreteSampleAverageMetric
    This class of hierarchy is used to manage values of a metric which is averaged in a discrete way.
    ManuallyComputedMetric
    This class is used for those metrics, which are computed from other performance counters.
    MetricSim
    Contains the skeleton methods and variables for concrete implementation of MetricSim classes.
    SummationMetric
    This class is just a wrapper around a summation variable, like total number of requests served.
    TimeAverageMetric
    This class of hierarchy is used to manage values of a metric which is averaged in a continuous way.
  • Classes in perfcenter.simulator.metric used by perfcenter.simulator.metric 
    Class and Description
    MetricSim
    Contains the skeleton methods and variables for concrete implementation of MetricSim classes.
  • Classes in perfcenter.simulator.metric used by perfcenter.simulator.queue 
    Class and Description
    DiscreteSampleAverageMetric
    This class of hierarchy is used to manage values of a metric which is averaged in a discrete way.
    SummationMetric
    This class is just a wrapper around a summation variable, like total number of requests served.
